scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js && NODE_ENV=development RAILS_ENV=development rails server -e local
scripts.test-suite: NODE_ENV=development webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js && RAILS_ENV=e2e_test RUBYOPT=-W:no-deprecated rspec --format documentation
scripts.start-test: NODE_ENV=development webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js && NODE_ENV=development RAILS_ENV=e2e_test rails server -e local
scripts.start-local-prod: NODE_ENV=development webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js && RAILS_ENV=production rails server -e production
